teaser: The rich are getting richer, but in different ways. Sports boosters can be great for a university, but their financial support comes at a high price. And a landmark environmental law comes under attack in California, as legislators complain the law has been abused.
byline: Kai Ryssdal, Sabri Ben-Achour, Nancy Marshall-Genzer, Amy Scott and Steve Gardner
title: Marketplace for Wednesday, September 11, 2013
description: The rich are getting richer, but in different ways. Sports boosters can be great for a university, but their financial support comes at a high price. And a landmark environmental law comes under attack in California, as legislators complain the law has been abused.
